abilities.name: Widow's Kiss: Sniper
abilities.description: Widowmaker’s versatile sniper rifle is ideal for scope-aimed shots at distant targets. 2.5x headshot multiplier (+0.5x compared to all other heros).

abilities.name: Widow's Kiss: Assault
abilities.description: Should targets close to medium range, the rifle can also be fired in fully-automatic mode. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook
abilities.description: Widowmaker launches a grappling hook towards the location she’s aiming at – when the hook connects with a scalable surface, she’s quickly drawn towards it.

abilities.name: Venom Mine
abilities.description: Widowmaker adheres a swiftly-arming venom mine to nearly any surface. When a target wanders within range of the mine’s motion trigger, it explodes, delivering poison gas to any enemies in the vicinity.

abilities.name: Infra-Sight
abilities.description: Widowmaker’s recon visor allows her to see the heat signatures of her targets through walls and objects for a moderate amount of time. This enhanced vision is shared with her allies.
